Úplná sračka co nefunguje, je tam plno bugů co nedokážou opravit za 4 roky. Komunita úplně o hovně samej facecamper killer nebo survivor co jen loopuje palety jak dement.
Hace falta mejorar el rendimiento en ordenadores de baja gama.

I got this for free from a friend to play with them. It was worth installing it for that purpose only. I'm not going to go into any detail about this as there are enough reviews to explain that. So, to keep it simple, you can't adjust mouse sensitivity. My mouse is at 540 dpi and the game is unplayable, especially as a killer. Survivors were literally running circles around me and mocking my inability to play. So, to the developers...

Update: Please go give [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/611360/Video_Horror_Society/]Video Horror Society[/url] some love. This game is free to play and the devs actually read the feedback in their discord. Plus they have good lore and better gameplay than DbD. In this game you need to fight back against the killer and that's what makes it's more fun especially when you compare it to DbD's pitiful flashlights and pallets. It's seriously the more evolved version of DbD.

tl;dr Dead By Daylight is the Fortnite of asymmetrical pvp "horror" games. I can't explain how much disdain I have for the developers for how they betrayed the community multiple times and have proved to be money-making shills no worse than EA. 
 
Gameplay:
Unfortunately this game sits in a bad middle-ground of being easy to entice players but not dynamic enough to add new engaging gamplay besides new character DLC and what little that entails. Literally every other asymmetrical game is more commendable than Behaviour. Behaviour is no better than your typical mobile game developer. Think I've being hyperbolic than see their actual mobile games they created. Let's start with their Westworld game that looks almost exactly like Fallout Shelter by Bethesda. Why is that? Because Behaviour was hired to make the code for Fallout Shelter and the contract said that Bethesda owned the code and BHVR had no right to use it. Well BHVR did use the code to make Westworld and it led to a lawsuit. But that's not all, they also got the rights to make a Game of Thrones game as well and that was nothing more than gacha game to farm microtransactions. So yeah, just know that you are essentially playing a mobile game on PC...similar to Fortnite.

Inept developers:
Not to mention the devs aren't that great at their own game. You can see footage of the game director getting destroyed while playing as the Hag. And my own anecdotal experience with one of the game's employees (which I will keep unnamed) who not once but twice dropped the pallet on first loop even when I was trying to protect them from the killer with a flahslight. Not to mention not being able to call out any locations such as Michael's house in Haddonfield. The first time loop pallet drop I could forgive but the second time was when I just rescued them off the hook, told them I would take a hit for them even though I also gave them borrowed time with said rescue and they still drop the pallet! How can you be a part of the production team involved with the game and still be so immersed that you cant even communicate while mid-chase.

Community:
As somebody who has played this game since early access and the developers are so greedy they will sacrifice the integrity of their lore among other things to bait money from the whales in this community. The level of salt in this community wasn't surprising when I found out how many middle-school kids and SJWs played this game. And I can testify to this because as a teacher and tutor I'd hear them talking about it. If you are wondering where the SJWs are then look no further than DbD's cringe-inducing discord.

Greed & Konami:
Behavior is just proved they are only in it for the money. They got sued for stealing the code from Fallout Shelter to make a Westworld ripoff. They made a microtransaction ridden mobile Game of Thrones game. If you think Behavior is a company that makes anything more than casual mobile game then you are sadly mistaken.

They are happy to work with Konami to make dlc content for a game franchise that Konami has all but destroyed. Mind you that Konami is the company that was so petty they refused to sell the rights of Silent Hill and other franchises the original creator made and then was petty enough to blacklist the creator's new game development company from getting health insurance for his employees through a health insurance subsidiary Konami know. Why am I not surprised that a game developer that has been caught stealing code and making freemium mobile games is working with a "game" developer that now strictly is involved with literal gambling.
dlc killers are Overpowerd, ranking sytem is trash. only play if you want  to spend more money and lose rank from low frames and high ping. better then F13 though.

Wieso also klappt das nicht mit mehreren obwohl platz ist ? Zu viert müsste es doch theoretisch am schnellsten gehen weil man nur auf einen killer warten muss oder nicht ?

Dead By Daylight é um jogo mais pra passar tempo, se destrair e tentar se divertir um pouco. Apesar de muita gente ter esse jogo como um jogo "principal", eu não creio que a maioria jogue esse jogo sério. O jogo fica super divertido jogando com seus amigos. Jogar sozinho em modo sobrevivencia exige a o trabalho em equipe de toda a pt e por isso, muitas vezes você acaba tendo um stress por esse ponto. 
Jogar de killer por um outro lado, é o que eu acho mais divertido no jogo. Mas eu recomendaria? NÃO.
A comunidade do jogo está COMPLETAMENTE tomada por jogadorews tóxicos e imaturos que não aceitam que você jogue de maneira diferente do que eles pensam. Você vai ser xingado SIM quase sempre que você fizer algo que eles queriam que você não fizesse. E a maioria não xinga só durante o game, os jogadores adicionam seu perfil na steam pra ir bostejar no seu chat também. Além disso, o jogo está repleto de bugs. Jogabilidade super repetitiva. 

Esse jogo só vale apena comprar se:
- Você comprar ele na promoção
- Se mais algum amigo comprar o jogo para ambos jogarem juntos.

Fora isso, você tem que gostar muito do jogo pra jogar, porque realmente, NÃO VALE APENA.

ATUALIZAÇÃO !!!!!!!!!!
Esse jogo é bastante viciante. Antes tinha falado que era difícil ver gente jogar ele como jogo principal e meu conceito sobre isso mudou.
A comunidade não mudou, continua tóxica.
Mas se você conseguir ignorar o que os outros falam, fica um jogo mega divertido mesmo jogando sozinho.
É fácil fazer amizades.
Então minha analise agora recomenda o jogo. Mas tenha em mente que o que foi dito acima da atualização é válida ainda.
not enough interesting gameplay for me and you can't play w/ friends if you have limited time as the matchmaking is terrible

dead by daylight şahsen ben beğenerek satın aldım yetmedi iki tane satın aldım son zamanlarda aşırı saran bi oyun ekipmanlarım csgo için ve tutup bu oyunu oynuyorum 1 aydır csgo oynamadım yani neyse kendimce eksi yönlerini söylemek istiyorum bana göre tek eksi yönü oyunun türkçe dil desteği olmaması ingilizcesi çok iyi olmıyan biri zorlanabilir ek olarak bundan 2 hafta önce bunu yazsaydım yakındığım şey ''failed to join game'' hatası olucaktıki oyunu bu yüzden bırakmıştım ama son güncellemeyle optimizasyon ve bugların çoğu düzeltilmiş sadece bazen oluşan şu laglar sinir bozucu olabiliyor oda büyük ihtimalle benim bağlantımla alakalı teşekkürler TTNET :) neyse oyun iyi bu tarz oyunları sevenler gönül rahatlığıyla alabilirler iyi oyunlar

不知道为什么这么多人黑这个游戏，在我看来这真的是一款很优秀的游戏。虽然这个游戏bug确实不少，组队也有问题，刷血点的人也没有被制裁，开挂的问题也时不时的出现。但是排除掉服务器的问题，这个游戏最大的问题难道不是玩家自己造成的？为什么现在这些刷血点的开挂的还有一些带节奏的狗以及一些及其不要脸的贴吧喷子还有脸来着黑这个游戏？
你知道多少新玩家因为你们的这些评论而望而却步吗？
同时我也希望这个游戏的服务商能改变态度，不要老想着圈钱，多解决bug和服务器的问题。我之前说了这么多也不能掩盖你们的错误。
[u] 是人毁了这个游戏，而不是这个游戏本身。[/u]
